message:
Unfortunately, I have no experience with ChannelFactory, but from other comments on my blog I gather that it doesn't directly support async. :(  

I suggest that you ask on the MSDN forums ([http://social.msdn.microsoft.com/Forums/vstudio/en-US/home?forum=wcf](http://social.msdn.microsoft.com/Forums/vstudio/en-US/home?forum=wcf)) to see if someone can give you some more detailed advice, and if necessary open a Microsoft Connect issue to request async support in ChannelFactory.
